sentence: The Jan. 6 committee has issued six new subpoenas related to the push to appoint alternate electors,? including Arizona Republican Party Chair Kelli Ward, Pennsylvania Republican State Sen. Doug Mastriano, who is running for governor, and Arizona GOP Secretary of State candidate Mark FInchem.
title: In Ukraine, Biden faces a crisis with little political benefit back home

sentence: With less than a week until the states primary election on Tuesday, polls show that State Senator Doug Mastriano one of the states central figures in the former presidents efforts to overturn the 2020 election has emerged as the clear front-runner in the G.O.P.
title: Hard-Liners Gain in Pennsylvania G.O.P. Races, Worrying Both Parties

sentence: And Trump, on Saturday weighed in with a last-minute endorsement in the governors race, picking Doug Mastriano, the candidate who is publicly backing and campaigning with Barnette.
title: Trump works overtime to push Dr. Oz over the finish line

sentence: The governor's race between Democrat and current Attorney General Josh Shapiro and Republican state Sen. Doug Mastriano is the only major race in the state that heavily favors the Democrats.
